mapper.select: select reserve_no,start_date,end_date,car_content,car_kind,title,c1.status,e.emp_Name from reserve_car c1 left outer join employee e on(c1.emp_no=e.emp_no) left outer join car c2 on(c1.car_no=c2.car_no) where (START_DATE between to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD') OR END_DATE between to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND c1.status='Y'
